name: Muk

ability.name: Sticky Goo
ability.effect: As long as Muk is your Active Pokemon, add 2 to the Defending Pokemon's Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Slimy Water
attacks.effect: Deal 10 damage times the Defending Pokemon's Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Acidic Gas
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Poisoned.

flavor: These slimy creatures are notoriously difficult to clean out of sewer systems. Small cities have been abandoned due to infestations.
